title: Bloomberg Markets:  Grant on Paying Attention to North Korea
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets:  Grant on Paying Attention to North Korea
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Mark Grant\u0010Managing Director/Chief Strategist\u0010Hilltop Securities \u0010Discussing North Korea's latest missile launch and why investors should not be too complacent about the risks.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
